Class RSAConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.scolastico.tools.simplified.rsa.RSAConverter

extends Object
    Several conversion functions for RSA and PEM keys

      • publicToPEM

        public static String publicToPEM​(PublicKey publicKey)
        Convert a public RSA key to a PEM key.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key to convert.
        Returns:
        The PEM key string.

      • privateToPEM

        public static String privateToPEM​(PrivateKey privateKey)
        Convert a private RSA key to a PEM key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key to convert.
        Returns:
        The PEM key string.

      • pemToBytes

        public static byte[] pemToBytes​(String pem)
        Convert a PEM key to a byte array. They key isn't checked before conversion!
        Parameters:
        pem - The PEM key to convert to a byte array.
        Returns:
        The byte array of the PEM key.

      • bytesToPublicKey

        public static PublicKey bytesToPublicKey​(byte[] bytes)
                                  throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                         InvalidKeySpecException
        Convert bytes to an RSA public key.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes to convert.
        Returns:
        The RSA public Key.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm can't be found on the system.
        InvalidKeySpecException - If the bytes can't be parsed to an RSA key.

      • bytesToPrivateKey

        public static PrivateKey bytesToPrivateKey​(byte[] bytes)
                                    throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                           InvalidKeySpecException
        Convert bytes to an RSA private key.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes to convert.
        Returns:
        The RSA private Key.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm can't be found on the system.
        InvalidKeySpecException - If the bytes can't be parsed to an RSA key.

      • privateKeyToKeyPair

        public static KeyPair privateKeyToKeyPair​(PrivateKey privateKey)
                                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                          InvalidKeySpecException
        Convert a private RSA key to a KeyPair with the public key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private RSA key.
        Returns:
        The KeyPair with the public RSA key.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm can't be found on the system.
        InvalidKeySpecException - If the private key can't be parsed to a public RSA key.

      • getBytes

        Convert a private RSA key to
        Parameters:
        key - The private RSA key to convert.
        Returns:
        The bytes of the key.

        Parameters:
        key - The public RSA key to convert.
        Returns:
        The bytes of the key.
